synopsis.text: Kobe becomes the backdrop for Birdy's latest mission, where she crosses paths with Sayaka Nakasugi, a girl under the watchful eye of Tsutomu Senkawa. But their encounter is far from ordinary, as others have their sights set on Nakasugi as well. In an attempt to spark a romantic connection between Tsutomu and Sayaka, Birdy employs her captivating alter ego. However, their plans take an unexpected turn when a Federation marionette enters the scene, leading to a series of unforeseen events. This OVA bridges the gap between the first and second seasons of Tetsuwan Birdy DECODE, offering a thrilling blend of romance and interstellar intrigue.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
